meta.title: Fables Monster Studio - Independent Tabletop RPG Creators
meta.description: Fables Monster Studio makes tabletop RPG adventures and tools — from heroic fantasy to sci-fi horror, one-shots to full campaigns, for Mothership RPG, D&D, and other systems.
meta.ogTitle: Fables Monster Studio - Independent Tabletop RPG Creators
meta.ogDescription: Independent tabletop RPG content creation studio.

kramp.title: HOLIDAY AUDIT:
kramp.subtitle: KRAMP.EXE
kramp.description: A holiday horror one-shot for Mothership RPG 1e. Survive the corporate holiday party where the audit is mandatory and failure is terminal.

about.title: THE CREW
about.description: Designers, writers, and artists making tabletop RPG content. Sci-fi, horror, dark comedy, fantasy — we work across genres and bring new stories to your table.
